name: fullapp-ecommerce
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: cd Server && npm install && cd ../Client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd Server && npm install && cd ../Client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Server && NODE_ENV=development npm run dev" "cd Client && npm start"
scripts.dev-prod: npm run build-client && cd Server && NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.dev-like-prod: npm run build-client && npm run serve-client
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd Client && npm install && cd ../Server && npm install
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules Client/node_modules Server/node_modules && npm run install-all
scripts.debug-build: echo '🔍 Installing Server dependencies...' && cd Server && npm install && echo '✅ Server deps installed' && echo '🔍 Installing Client dependencies...' && cd ../Client && npm install && echo '✅ Client deps installed' && echo '🔍 Building Client...' && npm run build && echo '✅ Build complete'
